item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Rubio in Saudi Arabia for Russia talks
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio will be joined in Saudi Arabia by National Security Adviser Mike Waltz and Middle East envoy Steve Witkoff.

item.title: WATCH: Cow herd makes its moo-ve into wedding party
item.description: One couple enjoying an outdoor wedding in Scotland ended up with a much bigger circle than they intended. ABC News’ Danny New has the details.

item.title: Watchdog says Israel advancing plans for nearly 1,000 more settler homes in West Bank
item.description: An anti-settlement watchdog says Israel has issued tenders for the construction of nearly 1,000 additional settler homes in the occupied West Bank

item.title: Elon Musk's latest move involves millions of Americans' personal tax details: Sources

item.title: GOP Sen. Mullin: Trump is the only person who can force Putin to the table
item.description: GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin said Trump has the capability to apply pressure to Russian President Vladimir Putin to negotiate a deal to end the war in Uk...
